Name: Medieval Hero
About the game: Medieval Hero is a fast-paced 2D platformer with many levels and enemies. Take on the role of a Medieval Knight and start crushing your enemies! Immerse yourself in a world full of adventures and dangers. Explore mysterious dungeons and fight bosses in your quest to end the war between the kingdom and the monsters! Features of the game: - Bright graphics - Lots of enemies! - Soundtrack to complement the game adventure! - A huge number of game levels.
